subject: Tests (Drug Use)
Doping (Sports)
Laboratories and Scientific Equipment
Olympic Games (2016)
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The antidoping laboratory in Rio de Janeiro, the 2016 Olympics host city, had its accreditation revoked because of “repeated failures.”
snippet: The antidoping laboratory in Rio de Janeiro, the 2016 Olympics host city, had its accreditation revoked because of “repeated failures.”
